entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who is shocked and annoyed at Harry for his trick with the bezoar. She is described as having been to the restricted section of the library in search of information on Horcruxes.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who has used a bezoar to trick Hermione. He is not described in detail in this passage.

relationships.description: Hermione is annoyed at Harry for his trick with the bezoar. This is described as she talks to him about her failure to find information on Horcruxes.
